name: WindowEventHandlers.onbeforeunload
description: The onbeforeunload property of the WindowEventHandlers mixin is the EventHandler for processing beforeunload events. These events fire when a window is about to unload its resources. At this point, the document is still visible and the event is still cancelable.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'onbeforeunload' in HTML Living Standard.
